$jsonSchema.title: Submissions Schema Validator
$jsonSchema.description: User submissions of images (imageurl only for now)

title.description: 'title' must be a string (1 to 128 chars) and is required

image_url.description: 'image_url' must be a string with 'https://<2040 char limit>' and is required

user_id.description: 'user_id' must be an objectId and is required

total_votes.description: 'total_votes' must be int (int32) and is required
